name: Dr. Ai Xin
research: Dr. Ai Xin's research interests include Multi-Agent Systems & Algorithmic Game Theory, Machine Learning and Deep Learning, and Data Mining. She has contributed to the field with publications such as 'Wi-Sh: A Simple, Robust Credit Based Wi-Fi Community Network' and 'Optimality and Complexity of Pure Nash Equilibria in the Coverage Game'.
prospective_students: Prospective students are encouraged to reach out to Dr. Ai Xin for guidance on courses and research opportunities in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.
